name: VZVirtioSocketConnection
desc: A port-based connection between the guest operating system and the host computer.

items.name: var sourcePort: UInt32
items.desc: The port number of the system that opened the connection.

items.name: var destinationPort: UInt32
items.desc: The destination port number of the connection.

items.name: var fileDescriptor: Int32
items.desc: The file descriptor to use when sending data.

items.name: func close()
items.desc: Close the file descriptor associated with the socket.
